name: Site - Sales Order Report
query:
SELECT
    site.circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:150",
    site.site_name AS "Site Name:Data:150",
    site.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
    site.site_type AS "Site Type:Data:120",
    site.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:120",
    site.stage AS "Stage:Data:100",
    site.lms_stage AS "LMS Stage:Data:120",
    site.order_type AS "Order Type:Data:120",
    site.solution_code AS "Solution Code:Data:150",
    site.billing_status AS "Billing Status:Data:120",
    site.partially_completed_date AS "Partially Completed Date:Date:150",
    
    so.name AS "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:150",
    so.project AS "Project:Link/Project:120",
    
    so_item.item_name AS "Item Name:Data:150",
    so_item.description AS "Description:Data:200",
    so_item.qty AS "Quantity:Float:100",
    so_item.rate AS "Rate:Currency:100",
    so_item.amount AS "Amount:Currency:120"

FROM
    `tabSite` site
JOIN
    `tabSales Order Item` so_item ON site.circuit_id = so_item.custom_feasibility
JOIN
    `tabSales Order` so ON so.name = so_item.parent

WHERE
    so.status = 'To Deliver and Bill'
ORDER BY
    site.circuit_id ASC;
